item.description:
Program Committee

  • 2025, USENIX Symposium on Operating Systems Design and Implementation (OSDI)
  • 2025, IEEE International Parallel & Distributed Processing Symposium (IPDPS) – Monitoring track
  • 2024, International Symposium on High-Level Parallel Programming and Applications (HLPP)
  • 2024, Workshop on Irregular Applications: Architectures and Algorithms (IA3 – co-located with Supercomputing)
  • 2024, ACM Symposium on High-Performance Parallel and Distributed Computing (HPDC) - Poster session
  • 2024, International Conference on Parallel Processing (ICPP) - ”Software” track
  • 2024, ICT.Open 2024 - CompSys track
  • 2023, IEEE International Symposium on Cluster, Cloud and Internet Computing (CCGrid 2023) – “Software Systems and Platforms” track
  • 2023, Supercomputing (SC) - “Post-Moore Computing” track
  • 2023, IEEE International Conference on High Performance Computing, Data, and Analytics (HiPC) – “High-Performance Computing – System Software” track
  • 2022, Supercomputing (SC) – Artifact Evaluation Committee
  • 2021, ACM International Conference on Architectural Support for Programming Languages and Operating Systems (ASPLOS ) – Artifact Evaluation Committee
  • 2021, Supercomputing (SC) – Artifact Evaluation Committee
  • 2020, International Conference on High Performance Computing & Simulation (HPCS)
  • 2020, IARIA International Conference on Advanced Communications and Computation (INFOCOMP 2020)
  • 2019, International Conference on High Performance Computing & Simulation (HPCS)

Activities

  • 2024, Co-Organizer of the Workshop on Hot Topics in Cloud Computing Performance (HotCloudPerf 2024) – Co-located at ICPE 2024

  • 2019, Publicity and Web Chair for the Autonomic Solutions for Parallel and Distributed Data Stream Processing (Auto-DaSP 2019) workshop – Co-located at Europar

  • 2018, Publicity and Web Chair for the Autonomic Solutions for Parallel and Distributed Data Stream Processing (Auto-DaSP) workshop – Co-located at Europar

  • 2018, Local Chair at the 24th International European Conference on Parallel and Distributed Computing (Europar 2018) – “Theory and Algorithms for Parallel Computation and Networking” track

  • 2017, Program Chair of the Special Session in “Smart Home and E-Health to improve the Quality of Life” at the 3rd EAI International Conference on Smart Objects and Technologies for Social Good (GoodTechs 2017)
